content: amigurumi pattern for crocheting starfish this is an original pattern written in english using american terminology to crochet your own cute starfish the starfish measures approximately 6 cm 2 4 inches in diameter this 7 page pattern includes detailed instructions of how to crochet starfish and a lot of step-by-step photos this pattern is suitable for those with beginner crochet skills and have knowledge of magic_ring/circle crocheting in spirals loop single_crochet increase and decrease basic sewing and embroidery techniques this pattern is intended only for personal use please don t give it out for your own don t distribute it and don t sell it you can sell finished products created by this pattern but please indicate my authorship thanks for shopping and happy crocheting angelina taranina / loopypattern
